pages.title: Modular Centrifuge Core
pages.text: The controller of the Modular Centrifuge multiblock, a 3x3x3 structure with 4 four corners at bottom layer.$(br)You can replace any Centrifuge Structure Box with functional part to improve the centrifuge.$(br)Modular Centrifuge doesn't allow shared blocks.

pages.title: Features
pages.text: Modular Centrifuge supports all centrifuge upgrades. Speed upgrades can shorten process time and productivity upgrades can increase parallel.$(br)The base process time is the same as basic centrifuge(15s).
